feature_name: Autopilot settings resilience tools and snooze-driven door friction adaptation
scope_summary: Add local reset/export/import controls, enforce behavior invariants with tests, and adapt door friction after repeated snoozes while preserving local-first operation.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: Changes are local data-management and on-device behavior logic only.
evidence: No legal pages or account flows changed

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: All stats and appointment data remain on-device; export/import is user-initiated JSON file transfer.
evidence: No analytics calls or external APIs added
Stats panel explicitly states on-device storage behavior

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: No medical guidance or claim language was added.

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Snooze escalation reduces repeated friction loops and Settings controls reduce abandonment after demo-data clutter.
evidence: Door friction auto-adjusts after repeated snoozes
Reset/export/import keeps users in control of their own setup

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: Non-judgmental adaptive copy and low-friction data recovery support real-world executive function variability.
evidence: Escalation copy is neutral and supportive
Reset + import flows lower restart cost

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Users gain recovery tools and clearer behavior rules with test coverage that reduces regression risk.
evidence: Invariant tests for persona options, overdue breathing, snooze direction, and mode visibility
Settings panel allows full reset, stats reset, export, and import

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Copy remains direct and non-hype while clarifying present limitations.

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: New controls are plain buttons and file input, retaining responsive layout behavior.

security_and_reliability.rationale: Import paths normalize data and persistence supports both IndexedDB and localStorage fallback.
evidence: Import parser validates and defaults malformed fields
Storage supports replace/reset in both primary and fallback engines

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No paywall, upsell, or conversion mechanics were added.

ship_decision.conditions: Ship and verify /hub/beta shows Settings actions, privacy copy, and snooze escalation message behavior.
